titleStmt.title: Български парламентарен корпус ParlaMint-BG [ParlaMint SAMPLE]
Bulgarian parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-BG [ParlaMint SAMPLE]
Стенограми от пленарни заседания на 43-то Народно събрание и 44-то Народно събрание на Република България (2014-10-27 - 2020-07-31)
Minutes of the 43th and 44th National Assemblies of the Republic of Bulgaria (2014-10-27 - 2020-07-31)

respStmt.resp: Валидиране на корпуса Parla-CLARIN TEI XML
Сваляне, почистване и конвертиране до XML
Download, clean-up converting of the data to XML

availability.p: Корпусът е достъпен чрез международния лиценз Creative Commons.
This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

bibl.title: Transcripts of plenary sittings of the Parliament of the Republic of Bulgaria

projectDesc.p: ParlaMintis a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the Parla-CLARIN recommendationsand covering the COVID-19 pandemic from November 2019 as well as the earlier period from 2015 to serve as a reference corpus; (2) process the corpora linguistically to add Universal Dependencies syntactic structures and Named Entity annotation; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers and Parlameter; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

correction.p: No correction of source texts was performed.

normalization.p: Normalisation was performed only on the meta-data, e.g. person names.

hyphenation.p: No end-of-line hyphens were present in the source.

quotation.p: Quotation marks have been left in the text and are not explicitly marked up.

segmentation.p: The texts are segmented into utterances (speeches) and segments (corresponding to paragraphs in the source transcription).

category.catDesc: Legislative period: term of the parliament between general elections.

Legislative session: the period of time in which a legislature is convened for purpose of lawmaking, usually being one of two or more smaller divisions of the entire time between two elections. A session is a meeting or series of connected meetings devoted to a single order of business, program, agenda, or announced purpose.
Meeting: Each meeting may be a separate session or part of a group of meetings constituting a session. The session/meeting may take one or more days.
Говорещ: обикновен изказващ се на заседание
Regular: a regular speaker at a meeting
Guest: a guest speaker at a meeting
